Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation:
q:$get(code)="" ##class(%SYSTEM.Status).Error(2, "Specify the attribute to report on.") q:$get(message)="" ##class(%SYSTEM.Status).Error(3, "Specify the error message.")
s ..code = code s ..message = message
if $find(occurredIn,$char(253),1) > 0 { set occurredIn = $piece(occurredIn,$char(253), 2) _ ", line " _ $piece(occurredIn,$char(253),3) }
s ..occurredIn = occurredIn
q $$$OK
